perks.description: Repulsor attacks deal [Particle] damage, seamlessly blending Stark repulsors with Pym Technology.

perks.title: Pym Oscillator
perks.description: Laser attacks deal [Particle] damage, seamlessly blending Stark weaponry with Pym Technology.

perks.title: Cryo Injector
perks.description: Light Combo Finishers trigger a burst of CRYO damage.

perks.title: Shield Summon Efficiency
perks.description: [15%] Reduction in energy cost for generating an ENERGY SHIELD.

perks.title: Shield Summon Efficiency
perks.description: [-20%] Damage Reduction while OVERCHARGED.

perks.title: Locked
perks.description: [-20%] Damage Reduction while OVERCHARGED.

perks.title: Plasma Repulsor
perks.description: Repulsor attacks deal PLASMA damage, applying the combustible properties of Horton Cell technology.

perks.title: Lab Overdrive
perks.description: [14%] Increased intrinsic energy charge speed durning [Cloning Lab] missions.

perks.title: Tachyon Rejuvenation
perks.description: [20%] Increased intrinsic energy charge speed durning [Tachyon Rifts].

perks.title: Aerial Impulse
perks.description: [11.3%] Increased stun damage from midair melee attacks.

perks.title: Locked
perks.description: [135%] Increased Critical Attack damage from Hulkbuster.

perks.title: Reflexive Tachyon Surge
perks.description: [19.5%] Change when Parrying an attack to activate a [TACHYON SURGE]. Surges increases all Status damage by [50%] while active.

perks.title: Vault Breaker
perks.description: % increased chance to receive Iso-8 shards when completing Vaults.

perks.title: Geode
perks.description: [%] Increased chance to find Iso-8 shards in strongboxes.

perks.title: Prismatic Catalyst
perks.description: [%] increased XP gains from all sources.

perks.title: Key Finder
perks.description: [%] chance enemies will drop additional resources when defeated.

perks.title: Sonic Boom
perks.description: Entering Sprint Flight will release a low damage but high impact radial shockwave that also destroys. any incoming projectiles.

perks.title: Priority Overflow
perks.description: [16.3%] Increased [Status] damage of any kind when on a [Priority] mission of any kind.

perks.title: Cosmic Augments
perks.description: Light Combo Finishers deal COSMIC damage.

perks.title: Locked
perks.description: Power Attacks deal COSMIC damage.

perks.title: Cosmic Invocation
perks.description: Pinned enemies suffer COSMIC damage, exposing nearby enemies to COSMIC energy

perks.title: Cosmic Enchantment
perks.description: Ranged power attacks deal COSMIC damage, erupting in COSMIC energy on impact.

perks.title: Awe
perks.description: Parrying an enemy attack triggers a visual flourish.
